trans-unit.source: Creates a panel that is associated with a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel> is a member of its associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> rather than being a member of the underlying form.

At design time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel> is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> class with its specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref>.
Gets or sets how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> attaches to the edges of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> values.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> is automatically resized; otherwise, `false`.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
Enables the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> to shrink when <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.AutoSize"></xref> is `true`.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode.GrowOnly"></xref>.
Gets or sets the border style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref>.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
Gets or sets which edge of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> is docked to.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.Dock"></xref> property changes.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
Gets the internal spacing between the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> and its edges.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges"></xref> that represents the padding for all the edges of a docked control.
Gets or sets the height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref>.
The height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref>, in pixels.
The height cannot be set.

Gets or sets the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> relative to the upper-left corner of its <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.

The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> relative to the upper-left corner of its <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>.
Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.Location"></xref> property changes.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
Gets or sets the size that is the upper limit that <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)"></xref> can specify.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
Gets or sets the size that is the lower limit that <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetPreferredSize(System.Drawing.Size)"></xref> can specify.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
The width cannot be set.
The name of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref>.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> representing the name of this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> that contains this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref>.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> that contains this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref>.
Gets or sets the height and width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref>.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the height and width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> in pixels.
Gets or sets the tab order of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> within its <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.

The index value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> within the set of other <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> objects within its <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> that are included in the tab order.
Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex"></xref> property changes.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> using the TAB key.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
`true` if the user can give the focus to this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> using the TAB key; otherwise, `false`.
Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabStop"></xref> property changes.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> is displayed.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> is displayed; otherwise, `false`.
Occurs when the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.Visible"></xref> property changes.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
For more information about handling events, see [Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
Gets or sets the width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref>.
The width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel"></xref> in pixels.
